name: g_enum_last_name
label::english: G2. Enumerator Name

name: g_enum_name
label::english: G2.1 Enumerator Family Name

name: g_enum_agency
label::english: G3. What is the enumerators agency?

name: g_enum_agency_other
label::english: G3.1 If other, please specify:

name: g_governorate
label::english: G4. Governorate

name: g_district
label::english: G5. District

name: g_sub_district
label::english: G6. Sub-district

name: g_location
label::english: G7. Location

name: g_sub_district_other
label::english: G7.1 If other, please specify

name: g_location_other
label::english: G7.2 If other, please specify

name: g_urbanrural
label::english: G8. Type of location
hint::english: A peri-urban location is a settlement next to an urban area (next to a city)

name: g_resident
label::english: G9. What is the status of the community members?

name: g_population
label::english: G10. What is approximately the number of households living in this location?

name: g_population_check
label::english: G10.1 Are you sure the number of households living in this location is ${g_population}?

name: g_population_correct
label::english: G10.2 Please enter the correct estimated amount of households living in this location

name: g_consent
label::english: G11. Hello, my name is [SAY YOUR NAME] and I am working for [SAY NAME OF YOUR ORGANIZATION], and we are conducting interviews to inform the humanitarian response for Yemen. This interview will take around 15 minutes. Information that you provide will not be identifiable and will be anonymous. Participation in this interview is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions. You are free to stop this interview at any time. Are you willing to be interviewed?
constraint_message::english: If the Key Informant does not want to be interviewed, close the form.

name: g_position_KI
label::english: G12. What is the role of the Key Informant in the community?

name: g_assistance
label::english: G13. Are there organizations or persons providing WASH or cholera assistance in this community during the past 2 months?

name: g_orgaid
label::english: G13.1 If yes, how many organizations or persons have provided WASH or cholera assistance in this community?
hint::english: For don't know, type 888. For refuse to answer, type 999

name: g_orgaid_check
label::english: G13.2 Are you sure the number of organizations providing WASH or cholera assistance in this community is ${g_orgaid_check}?

name: g_orgaid_correct
label::english: G13.2.1 Please enter the correct estimated amount of organizations providing WASH or cholera assistance in this community

name: g_orgaidloop
label::english: Record the name of each organization that provided aid in this community during the past 2 months as well as the type of aid provided

name: g_Name_of_Organization
label::english: G13.5 Record the name of the organization

name: g_orgtype
label::english: G13.3 What type of organization is this?

name: g_org_aid
label::english: G13.6 What type of aid did this organization provide in this community during the past 2 months?
hint::english: If this is not known, please write that it is not known.

name: W1_Water
label::english: 1. Water

name: w_mainsource
label::english: W1. What is the main source of water used by people in the community for drinking?

name: w_drinksource
label::english: W2. What is the main source of water used by people in the community for other purposes such as cooking, bathing and washing?

name: w_waterappear
label::english: W3. Did community members have any issues relating to taste, appearance, or smell of their main drinking water source in the last 30 days?

name: w_watersmell
label::english: W3.1 If yes, what are the issues?

name: w_waterneeds
label::english: W4. Do people in the community have enough water for drinking, cooking, bathing and washing?

name: w_wateraccess
label::english: W5. Do people in the community have problems related to access to water?

name: w_accessproblem
label::english: W5.1 If yes, which problems?

name: w_accessproblem_other
label::english: W5.2 If other, please specify:

name: w_treatwater
label::english: W6. Do people in the community treat water  in any way to make it safer to drink?

name: w_treatmethod
label::english: W6.1 What are the methods that people use for treating water to make it safer?
relevant: selected(${w_treatwater},'2') or selected(${w_treatwater},'3') or selected(${w_treatwater},'4') or selected(${w_treatwater},'5')

name: w_treatmethod_other
label::english: W6.1 If other, please specify:

name: w_note
label::english: Please rank the water treatment methods that are being used in this community.

name: w_treatrank_stand
label::english: W6.1 What is the rank of this method 'stand and settle'?
hint::english: 1=most used; 2=second most used; 3=third most used, et cetera

name: w_treatrank_boiling
label::english: W6.1 What is the rank of this method 'boiling'?
hint::english: 1=most used; 2=second most used; 3=third most used, et cetera

name: w_treatrank_sun
label::english: W6.1 What is the rank of this method 'sunlight'?
hint::english: 1=most used; 2=second most used; 3=third most used, et cetera

name: w_treatrank_chlorine
label::english: W6.1 What is the rank of this method 'chlorine'?
hint::english: 1=most used; 2=second most used; 3=third most used, et cetera

name: w_treatrank_filter
label::english: W6.1 What is the rank of this method 'filter'?
hint::english: 1=most used; 2=second most used; 3=third most used, et cetera

name: w_treatrank_other
label::english: W6.1 What is the rank of this method ' ${w_treatmethod_other} '?
hint::english: 1=most used; 2=second most used; 3=third most used, et cetera

name: w_treatwater_who
label::english: W6.2 Who usually treats the water?
relevant: selected(${w_treatwater},'2') or selected(${w_treatwater},'3') or selected(${w_treatwater},'4') or selected(${w_treatwater},'5')

name: w_whynot_treat
label::english: W6.3 Why do people not treat their water?

name: w_whynot_treat_other
label::english: W6.4 If other, please specify:

name: w_chlorinedistribution
label::english: W7. Has there been a chlorine (tablet/liquid/powder) distribution in the community?

name: w_chlorineyear
label::english: W7.1 If yes, please enter the year of the last distribution

name: w_chlorinemonth
label::english: W7.2 If yes, please enter the month of the last distribution

name: w_jerrycan
label::english: W8. How many people in the community have at least one jerry can?

name: w_jerrycandistribution
label::english: W9. Has there been a jerry can distribution in the community?

name: w_jerrycanyear
label::english: W9.1 If yes, please enter the year of the last distribution

name: w_jerrycanmonth
label::english: W9.2 If yes, please enter the month of the last distribution

name: H2_Hygiene
label::english: 2. Hygiene

name: h_have_soap
label::english: H1.Do people in the community have enough soap?
hint::english: Soap includes soap bar; liquid soap; powder detergent; and soapy water, as well as ash and other handwashing agents. (Select one)

name: h_soapaccess
label::english: H2. Do people in the community have problems related to accessing soap?

name: h_soap_problem
label::english: H2.1 If yes, what problems do people experience related to accessing soap?

name: h_soap_problem_other
label::english: H2.2 If other, please specify:

name: h_soapdistribution
label::english: H3. Has there been a soap distribution in the community?

name: h_soapyear
label::english: H3.1 If yes, please enter the year of the last distribution

name: h_soapmonth
label::english: H3.2 If yes, please enter the month of the last distribution

name: h_campaign
label::english: H4. Have any hygiene awareness campaigns taken place in the community during the past 12 months?

name: h_staff
label::english: H5. Are there staff in the community who already have the skills and time for conducting hygiene awareness campaigns?

name: S3_Sanitation
label::english: 3. Sanitation

name: s_latrineaccess
label::english: S1. How many households in the community have access to a functioning latrine?

name: s_latrinetype
label::english: S2. What are the most common types of sanitation facilities (latrines/toilets) used by people in the community?

name: s_latrineissues
label::english: S3 What are the issues with the latrines?

name: s_accessgroupyesno
label::english: S4. Are there any specific groups that have no access to adequate latrines?

name: s_accessgroup
label::english: S4.1 Which groups have no adequate access to latrines?

name: s_accessgroup_other
label::english: S4.1 If other, please specify:

name: s_garbage_collection
label::english: S5. Is household garbage collected regularly in the community?

name: s_garbage_responsible
label::english: S6.  Who in the household is usually responsible for the household garbage?

name: s_garbage_disposal
label::english: S7. Is household garbage disposed in containers in the community?

name: s_ors
label::english: S8. How many households in the community know how to prepare ORS?

name: s_ors_who
label::english: S8.1 Which person in the household is usually responsible for preparing the ORS?
relevant: selected(${s_ors},'2') or selected(${s_ors},'3') or selected(${s_ors},'4') or selected(${s_ors},'5')

name: s_ors_who_other
label::english: S8.2 If other, please specify:

name: s_orc
label::english: S9. Is there a ORC or DTC that is within 30 minutes walking for all community members?
hint::english: ORC=oral rehydration corner; DTC=diarrhoea treatment centre

name: x_Note
label::english: Thank you very much for your time and your answers

name: x_form
label::english: X1. Was this interview done using a mobile telephone or a paper-form?
hint::english: This question is to be answered by the enumerator

label::english: Please take a picture of the first page of the form

name: x_form_picture_2
label::english: Please take a picture of the second page of the form

name: x_form_picture_3
label::english: Please take a picture of the third page of the form
